title: Game crashed, lost internet connection= 5 lower que games for 20 mins each
body:
I'm sorry but this wasn't  my fault! i was going into a game and the loading screen was fine and i was watching YouTube in the background and all of a sudden an error message popped up saying there was a network error and i checked my internet and it was fine but i restarted my computer anyway. I then try to reconnect to the game and the loading screen tried to load but it came up as a black screen and then said that the game was over and now i have a 5 game lower Que for 20 mins each. This is not the first time this has happened and its beginning to get really annoying when its not even my fault and im not exactly leaving the game. 

could someone please help me either find a bug somewhere with my connection or help me find the problem to this as i dont want to keep randomly getting disconnected and then getting penalised for it. 

Many thanks,

{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Sorry about the lower priority queue.  :(  The circumstances are not fun especially if it's out of your control.  We aren't able to remove the [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but I do want to help you troubleshoot and help prevent it in the future.  

Even though your internet seemed okay, something is blocking your network from reaching the game server.  That's why there is this black screen, because no assets are being downloaded.  You should stick to custom games for now, and use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
